hotels.name: Palazzo Venart
hotels.tagline: Venetian Gothic palace on the Grand Canal
hotels.short_description: 16th-century palazzo with original Murano chandeliers, gilded ceilings, and private Grand Canal water entrance. Suites feature Venetian school frescoes and terrazzo floors.

hotels.name: Castello di Velona
hotels.tagline: Medieval castle overlooking Val d'Orcia UNESCO site
hotels.short_description: 11th-century castle with baronial hall, monumental fireplace, thermal spa in historic cellars, and Brunello vineyard. Panoramic views of UNESCO Val d'Orcia's rolling hills.

hotels.name: Monastero Santa Rosa
hotels.tagline: 17th-century monastery perched above the Amalfi Coast
hotels.short_description: Former Benedictine monastery from 1681 with cliffside infinity pool, Michelin-starred restaurant, private beach access, and original frescoed cloister. Panoramic Mediterranean views from every suite.

hotels.name: Masseria Torre Coccaro
hotels.tagline: Ancient fortified masseria among olive groves
hotels.short_description: 15th-century fortified masseria with medieval watchtower, restored trulli, 20 hectares of ancient olive groves, and Adriatic Sea views. Authentic Puglian cuisine from organic vegetable gardens.

hotels.name: Belmond Villa San Michele
hotels.tagline: Former monastery with loggia designed by Michelangelo
hotels.short_description: 15th-century Franciscan monastery with Michelangelo-attributed fa√ßade. Renaissance loggia overlooking Florence and Duomo, heated panoramic pool, frescoed cloister, and Michelin-starred La Loggia restaurant.

hotels.name: Palazzo Avino
hotels.tagline: 12th-century palace with terraced gardens above Amalfi
hotels.short_description: 12th-century noble palace with Michelin-starred terrace restaurant Rossellinis, heated infinity pool, Amalfi lemon gardens, and original Vietri ceramic floors. Private beach club at Marmorata.

hotels.name: Borgo Santo Pietro
hotels.tagline: Medieval borgo with organic farm and spa sanctuary
hotels.short_description: 13th-century restored borgo with 300-acre organic estate including vineyards, olive groves, and ancient forests. Crystal greenhouse spa, Michelin farm-to-table restaurant, private consecrated chapel.

hotels.name: Villa Cimbrone
hotels.tagline: Historic villa with the Terrace of Infinity
hotels.short_description: 11th-century villa with UNESCO-view Terrace of Infinity, Romanesque medieval cloister, historic rose gardens, and neoclassical sculpture collection. 360-degree Amalfi Coast panoramas.

hotels.name: Castello di Casole
hotels.tagline: 10th-century Tuscan castle estate with spa and vineyard
hotels.short_description: 10th-century Longobard castle with 4,200-acre estate, historic Chianti Classico vineyard, vineyard spa with vinotherapy treatments, and private villas with pools. Restaurant Tosca serves regional cuisine.

hotels.name: Verdura Resort
hotels.tagline: Rocco Forte estate on Sicily's ancient coast
hotels.short_description: 570-acre Mediterranean estate with private golden sand beach, thalassotherapy spa, Nero d'Avola vineyard, and villas with Caltagirone ceramic details. Six restaurants with Sicilian contemporary cuisine.

hotels.name: Belmond Villa Sant'Andrea
hotels.tagline: Belle √âpoque villa with private beach in Taormina
hotels.short_description: 1830s Liberty-style villa on the Bay of Sirens with private beach, subtropical terraced gardens, original frescoes, and Etna wine cellar. Gourmet restaurant with local seafood and Teatro Greco views.
amenities: Private beach on Bay of Sirens

hotels.name: Rosewood Castiglion del Bosco
hotels.tagline: Medieval borgo in Brunello wine territory
hotels.short_description: 11th-century castle and borgo with organic Brunello DOCG vineyard, Michelin-starred restaurant Campo del Drago, Romanesque frescoed chapel, and 18-hole golf course on 2,000-acre estate.

hotels.name: Relais Santa Croce
hotels.tagline: Renaissance palace steps from Santa Croce Basilica
hotels.short_description: 18th-century Renaissance palace with frescoed ballroom, Michelin-starred rooftop restaurant Guelfi e Ghibellini, original Renaissance furnishings, and Santa Croce Basilica views. Exclusive spa with hammam.

hotels.name: Palazzo Tornabuoni
hotels.tagline: Renaissance elegance in the heart of Florence
hotels.short_description: 16th-century palazzo with Renaissance master-frescoed ceilings, monumental Carrara marble staircase, rooftop terrace with Duomo views, and private art collection. Renaissance library with rare volumes.

hotels.name: Villa La Pietra
hotels.tagline: Historic villa among Tuscan hills and cypress trees
hotels.short_description: 1580 noble villa with 15 hectares of Chianti vineyards and Italian Renaissance gardens. Frescoed private chapel, historic lemon house, barrel-vaulted wine cellar, and organic olive oil production.

hero.heading: Experience Italy's Living History
hero.subheading: Discover meticulously restored palazzos, noble villas, and ancient masserie where centuries of Italian artistry, elegance, and tradition welcome the discerning traveler.

seo_keywords_english: Italian heritage hotels, luxury historic villas Italy, Tuscan palazzo hotels, authentic masseria Puglia, historic castle stays Italy, Italian noble residences, boutique heritage hotels Italy, Renaissance villa Italy, luxury agriturismo Tuscany, Amalfi Coast historic hotels
meta_description: Discover Italy's finest heritage hotels - authentic palazzos, historic villas, and luxury masserie. Curated slow travel experiences in Tuscany, Amalfi Coast, Sicily, and beyond. Book your piece of Italian history.
